eval_rocket_league.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 """Evaluate a whole directory of models for the rocket league project
3 License:
4  BSD 3-Clause License
5  Copyright (c) 2023, Autonomous Robotics Club of Purdue (Purdue ARC)
6  All rights reserved.
7 """
8 
9 from rktl_autonomy import RocketLeagueInterface
10 from stable_baselines3 import PPO
11 from stable_baselines3.common.vec_env import SubprocVecEnv
12 from stable_baselines3.common.env_util import make_vec_env
13 from stable_baselines3.common.evaluation import evaluate_policy
14 from os.path import expanduser
15 from sys import argv
16 from glob import glob
17 import uuid
18 
19 if __name__ == '__main__': # this is required due to forking processes
20  run_id = str(uuid.uuid4()) # ALL running environments must share this
21  print(f"RUN ID: {run_id}")
22 
23  # to pass launch args, add to env_kwargs: 'launch_args': ['render:=false', 'plot_log:=true']
24  env = make_vec_env(RocketLeagueInterface, env_kwargs={'run_id':run_id,
25  'launch_args':['render:=false', 'plot_log:=false']},
26  n_envs=24, vec_env_cls=SubprocVecEnv)
27 
28  assert len(argv) >= 2
29  for model_run_id in argv[1:]:
30  print(f"Evaluating training run: {model_run_id}")
31  model_dir = expanduser(f'~/catkin_ws/data/rocket_league/{model_run_id}')
32 
33  with open(f'{model_dir}/eval_log_{run_id}.txt', 'w') as logfile:
34  logfile.write("Training Episodes\tMean Reward\tStd-Dev Reward\n")
35 
36  for weight in glob(f'{model_dir}/rl_model_*_steps.zip'):
37  model = PPO.load(weight.replace('.zip', ''))
38  mu, sigma = evaluate_policy(model, env, n_eval_episodes=48)
39 
40  episodes = weight.replace(f'{model_dir}/rl_model_', '').replace('_steps.zip', '')
41  logfile.write(f"{episodes}\t{mu:.3f}\t{sigma:.3f}\n")
42  logfile.flush()
43 
44  env.close() # this must be done to clean up other processes

rktl_autonomy
